title: The Silk Kingdom
overview: In the Silk Kingdom, fate takes a dark turn on the birth of King Noor Al-Din's second son when the treacherous Golden Uncle kills the king and hunts his heirs. Loyal servant Radwan flees with princes Shams Al-Din and Jalal Al-Din, but they are separated. Shams grows up as a slave soldier, while Jalal survives among outlaws. When they reunite, loyalty and betrayal collide in a battle for power.
